{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_KnightAttack}} '''A_KnightAttack'''
(no parameters) Does nothing if the calling actor has no valid target. If the target is within melee range, this inflicts it 3d8 damage and plays the sound "hknight/melee" on the BODY channel. Otherwise, it plays the calling actor's attack sound on the same channel, and throws at the target either a {{Class|KnightAxe}} or a {{Class|RedAxe}}. The latter is selected about 16% of the time, or if the calling actor has the SHADOW flag; for this reason a {{Class|Knight}} will throw mostly ethereal axes while a {{Class|KnightGhost}} will always throw bloody axes.
